parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Use to validate your permission is accessible. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: merchant_id
parameters.description: Merchant unique identifier to be checked. Required for all merchant level requests

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_key, timestamp, merchant_reference_id and verify_code. For more details refer to signature generation

response_fields.name: pub_time
response_fields.description: The timestamp when the merchant was created in the system

response_fields.name: expire_date
response_fields.description: The expiring date API token and related parameters

response_fields.name: merchant_currency
response_fields.description: Base merchant deposit FIAT and USE case FIAT. Two Fixed merchant currency value [CNY and USD]. Base FIAT token should support on chain FIAT money

response_fields.name: merchant_region
response_fields.description: Region of the merchant including FE fall area (regional group)

response_fields.name: is_qualified_info
response_fields.description: Use this field to identify whether the merchant is qualified to use
